name: @astrojs/react
author: Astro Team
description: Astro的官方React集成，用于在Astro项目中使用React组件。
descriptionEn: Astro's official React integration for using React components in Astro projects.

name: @astrojs/vue
author: Astro Team
description: Astro的官方Vue集成，用于在Astro项目中使用Vue组件。
descriptionEn: Astro's official Vue integration for using Vue components in Astro projects.

name: @astrojs/svelte
author: Astro Team
description: Astro的官方Svelte集成，用于在Astro项目中使用Svelte组件。
descriptionEn: Astro's official Svelte integration for using Svelte components in Astro projects.

name: @astrojs/preact
author: Astro Team
description: Astro的官方Preact集成，用于在Astro项目中使用Preact组件。
descriptionEn: Astro's official Preact integration for using Preact components in Astro projects.

name: @astrojs/solid-js
author: Astro Team
description: Astro的官方SolidJS集成，用于在Astro项目中使用SolidJS组件。
descriptionEn: Astro's official SolidJS integration for using SolidJS components in Astro projects.

name: @astrojs/alpinejs
author: Astro Team
description: Astro的官方Alpine.js集成，用于在Astro项目中使用Alpine.js。
descriptionEn: Astro's official Alpine.js integration for using Alpine.js in Astro projects.

name: @astrojs/netlify
author: Astro Team
description: Astro的官方Netlify适配器，用于在Netlify上部署Astro项目。
descriptionEn: Astro's official Netlify adapter for deploying Astro projects on Netlify.

name: @astrojs/vercel
author: Astro Team
description: Astro的官方Vercel适配器，用于在Vercel上部署Astro项目。
descriptionEn: Astro's official Vercel adapter for deploying Astro projects on Vercel.

name: @astrojs/cloudflare
author: Astro Team
description: Astro的官方Cloudflare适配器，用于在Cloudflare上部署Astro项目。
descriptionEn: Astro's official Cloudflare adapter for deploying Astro projects on Cloudflare.

name: @astrojs/node
author: Astro Team
description: Astro的官方Node.js适配器，用于在Node.js环境中部署Astro项目。
descriptionEn: Astro's official Node.js adapter for deploying Astro projects in Node.js environments.

name: @astrojs/mdx
author: Astro Team
description: Astro的官方MDX集成，用于在Astro项目中使用MDX格式。
descriptionEn: Astro's official MDX integration for using MDX format in Astro projects.

name: @astrojs/sitemap
author: Astro Team
description: Astro的官方站点地图插件，用于生成网站的XML站点地图。
descriptionEn: Astro's official sitemap plugin for generating XML sitemaps for websites.

name: @astrojs/partytown
author: Astro Team
description: Astro的官方Partytown集成，用于在Web Worker中运行第三方脚本。
descriptionEn: Astro's official Partytown integration for running third-party scripts in Web Workers.

name: @astrojs/markdoc
author: Astro Team
description: Astro的官方Markdoc集成，用于在Astro项目中使用Markdoc格式。
descriptionEn: Astro's official Markdoc integration for using Markdoc format in Astro projects.

name: @astrojs/tailwind
author: Astro Team
description: Astro的官方Tailwind CSS集成，一键集成Tailwind CSS。
descriptionEn: Astro's official Tailwind CSS integration for easy Tailwind setup.

name: astro-seo
author: Astro Community
description: 简化SEO标签配置，支持Open Graph、Twitter Card、结构化数据。
descriptionEn: Simplify SEO tag configuration with support for Open Graph, Twitter Card, and structured data.

name: @altano/astro-opengraph
author: Altano
description: 自动生成Open Graph图片，提升社交分享效果。
descriptionEn: Automatically generate Open Graph images to enhance social sharing.

name: astro-icon
author: Astro Community
description: 集成Iconify图标库，支持本地SVG，自动内联优化。
descriptionEn: Integrate Iconify icon library with support for local SVGs and automatic inline optimization.

name: astro-fonts-next
author: Astro Community
description: 字体优化，自动预加载、子集化，同Next.js字体方案。
descriptionEn: Font optimization with automatic preloading, subsetting, similar to Next.js font方案.

name: astro-expressive-code
author: Astro Community
description: 代码高亮增强，支持VS Code主题、复制按钮、代码标注、终端样式。
descriptionEn: Enhanced code highlighting with support for VS Code themes, copy buttons, code annotations, and terminal styles.

name: astro-toc
author: Astro Community
description: 自动生成页面目录，适配博客/文档长内容。
descriptionEn: Automatically generate table of contents for blog posts and documentation.

name: astro-critters
author: Astro Community
description: 关键CSS内联，优化首屏渲染速度。
descriptionEn: Critical CSS inline to optimize first screen rendering speed.

name: astro-compress
author: Astro Community
description: 构建时压缩HTML/CSS/JS/图片，减小打包体积。
descriptionEn: Compress HTML/CSS/JS/images during build to reduce bundle size.

name: sonda
author: Astro Community
description: 打包分析工具，可视化Bundle体积，优化依赖。
descriptionEn: Bundle analysis tool to visualize bundle size and optimize dependencies.

name: astro-auto-import
author: Astro Community
description: 自动导入常用组件，无需手动写import。
descriptionEn: Automatically import common components without manual import statements.

name: @swup/astro
author: Swup Team
description: 平滑页面过渡，预加载提升导航体验。
descriptionEn: Smooth page transitions and preloading to enhance navigation experience.

name: astro-devtool-breakpoints
author: Astro Community
description: 开发工具栏显示当前视口断点（Tailwind类）。
descriptionEn: Development toolbar to display current viewport breakpoints (Tailwind classes).

name: astro-i18nya
author: Astro Community
description: 轻量国际化方案，多语言路由与内容管理。
descriptionEn: Lightweight internationalization solution with multi-language routing and content management.

name: vite-plugin-pwa
author: Vite Community
description: 零配置PWA，生成Manifest与Service Worker，支持离线访问。
descriptionEn: Zero-config PWA with manifest and service worker generation for offline access.

name: astro-embed
author: Astro Community
description: 为Astro网站嵌入各种媒体内容的插件。
descriptionEn: Astro plugin for embedding various media content.

name: twikoo
author: imaegoo
description: 一个简洁、安全、免费的静态网站评论系统。
descriptionEn: A simple, safe, and free comment system for static websites.
